---
title: "Schedule"
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE, results='markup'}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(glue)
library(here)
library(gt)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE)
```

```{r schedule-prep}
schedule <- read_csv(here("data/schedule.csv"), na = "", guess_max = 0, col_types = "c") %>%
    select(speaker_id, date, session, start_time, end_time, full_name, title) %>% 
    mutate(across(everything(), ~if_else(is.na(.), "", .))) %>%
    mutate(end_time = if_else(end_time == "", "", str_c("-", end_time))) %>% 
    mutate(times = glue("{start_time}{end_time}"),
           talk = if_else(full_name == "", "", as.character(glue("*{title}*, [{full_name}](speakers.qmd#{speaker_id})"))),
           days = stamp_date("March 1", quiet = TRUE)(ymd(date))) %>% 
    rename_with(str_to_sentence) 

dates <- schedule %>% 
    pull(Days) %>% 
    unique()
    
create_table <- function(data) {
    data %>%
        select(Session, Times, Talk) %>%
        gt(groupname_col = "Session") %>%
        tab_style(style = list(cell_text(weight = "bold")),
                  locations = cells_row_groups()) %>%
        tab_style(style = list(cell_text(weight = "bold")),
                  locations = cells_column_labels()) %>%
        opt_table_lines("none") %>%
        opt_table_outline("none") %>% 
        fmt_markdown(columns = everything()) %>% 
        tab_options(column_labels.hidden = TRUE)
}
```

## Day 1: `r dates[1]`

```{r}
schedule %>% 
    filter(Days == dates[1]) %>% 
    create_table()
```

## Day 2: `r dates[2]`

```{r}
schedule %>% 
    filter(Days == dates[2]) %>% 
    create_table()
```
